title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not explain that the thin and stacked nature of the thylakoids increases the surface area of the thylakoid membrane, allowing for a greater number of chlorophyll molecules and electron transport proteins.

The response explains that the thin and stacked nature of the thylakoids increases the surface area of the thylakoid membrane, allowing for a greater number of chlorophyll molecules and electron transport proteins.
